wikipedia_page.main: Major General Colin Terry Shortis  (18 January 1934 – 8 January 2017) was a senior British Army officer.

link_mentions.page: List of people educated at Bedford School
response: *Major General Colin Shortis CB CBE (born 1934), Director of Infantry, British Army, 1983–1986, and General Officer Commanding, North West District, 1986–1989
